enWisdom: Divulgence [of secrets] is [and act of] disloyalty
Divulgence [of secrets] is the practice of the others [and not of the believers]
Divulging the secret that has been entrusted to you is a [form of] betrayal

Wisdom: مَنْ أَفْشَى سِرّاً اسْتُودِعَهُ فَقَدْ خَانَ
enWisdom: One who divulges a secret that has been entrusted to him has betrayed [a trust]

Wisdom: مَنْ ضَعُفَ عَنْ سِرِّهِ فَهُوَ عَنْ سِرِّ غَيْرِهِ أَضْعَفُ
enWisdom: Whoever is weak in keeping his own secret, he will be even weaker in keeping the secret of others

Wisdom: مَنْ ضَعُفَ عَنْ حِفْظِ سِرِّهِ لَمْ يَقْوَ لِسِرِّ غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: One who is too weak to protect his [own] secret will not be strong enough to protect the secret of others

Wisdom: مَا لُمْتُ أَحَداً عَلَى إِذَاعَةِ سِرِّي إِذْ كُنْتُ بِهِ أَضْيَقَ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: I have never blamed anyone for divulging my secret when I was more unaccommodating of it than him [by revealing it to him in the first place]

Wisdom: مَا لُمْتُ أَحَداً عَلَى إِذَاعَةِ سِرِّي إِذْ كُنْتُ بِهِ أَضْيَقَ
enWisdom: I have never blamed anyone for divulging my secret when I was more unaccommodating of it than him [by revealing it to him in the first place]
One who does not safeguard his affairs is destroyed
Do not confide in the one who would divulge your secret
Be neither scandalmongers nor revealers of others’ secrets
He who divulges his secrets does not remain safe
From the ugliest form of betrayal is divulging a secret
